definition: an endorsed policy in the platform of a political party, cook and serve on a plank
details:
noun
- an endorsed policy in the platform of a political party
- a stout length of sawn timber
= synonyms: board
verb
- cook and serve on a plank
- cover with planks
= example: cover with planks
= synonyms: plank over
- set something or oneself down with or as if with a noise
= example: set something or oneself down with or as if with a noise
= synonyms: plop
